name: Ansel Adams Publishing Rights Trust
description: The Ansel Adams Publishing Rights Trust manages copyright for works by Ansel Adams.

name: Mountain Light Gallery
description: Mountain Light is a multi-faceted business, established in 1983 by Galen and Barbara Rowell. Mountain Light Gallery is open to the public, although Mountain Light’s core business is an image licensing department, housing hundreds of thousands of Galen’s and Barbara’s color images.
